title: UK scheme calls on landlords to check for legal residency status (ICREA - International Consortium ...
text: ( Source : ICREA - International Consortium of Real Estate Associations) All news October 23 , 2015 Beginning next February, private landlords in the UK, or their agents, will be required to check new tenants to ensure their legal right to be
